TopicTitle: Can't move kerbal after EVA on mun

Articles.Content: After landing on mun did EVA from craft with kerbal and was able to move using ASWD keys on the surface until I planted a flag. After this the kerbal no longer responded to the ASWD keys. I loaded a quicksave after landing and then was able to move again with the ASWD keys but then the keys to climb the ladder and board the craft (tried jumping since I couldn't climb) did not work. The pop-up showing the keys for grabbing the ladder and boarding was also partially cut off when it appeared. Got frustrated so haven't tried the quick save again yet, but wanted to report the bug.
